string.text: Wild game meat
Field dress freshly dead mutants to collect game meat. Then deliver %s to Skinflint in the Military Warehouse base camp.
I have just the job for you, man, if you are not afraid of a few mutants. Are you interested?

Some of the guys bring me back a kill or two every now and again. But it's been slow lately - So if you aren't too busy and you are out and about, I need %s. Our cook kills and processes the meat, right here in the kitchen.
Great, you are a good hunter! I have payment for you.
Find %s
You have been asked to retrieve a %s. Bring it back to Screw if you happen to find one.
Yo, man. Are you interested in doing a job for me? I need specific tools to operate on weapons.
Good, I need a %s. I will pay you if you can bring a set back to me.
Thanks, man! I knew there was a reason I asked you. You look like a man who can get shit done.
Find %s
You have been asked to retrieve a %s. He needs more advanced tools to perform even better upgrades. Bring it back to Screw if you happen to get your hands on one.
Haha, I'd hate to ask. But I could really use more tools. You brought me what I have asked last time but I need a higher quality set. Can you help out again?
Good, I need an %s. It should contain some more tools I need to do some work on weapons.
You keep this shit up, everyone around here is going to love you. Thanks, man.
Conquer Territory
You have been tasked to advance on a territorial threat within an area. Report back to Lukash after the job is done.
I have been informed that a threat to one of our camps exists. We must react before they move in. I need someone capable of carrying this task out.
The task is done? Good.
Defend Territory
You have been tasked to defend a faction territory. Report back to Lukash after the job is done.
I have an important mission available. Duty has taken over one of our camps and I need a squad of good men to reclaim it.
The task is done? Good job.
Assassination
Lukash has ordered you to find and eliminate the target.
I have a list of VIPs that need...taken care of. Some are informants, high-ranking Duty members, squad leaders, tacticians or just plain scum. Extract information if you can, otherwise kill-on-sight.
Great! You do us proud. Here is what I promised:
